section.title: Mission, Vision & Values
section.subtitle: Guided by integrity, innovation, and compliance, we're building Qatar's most trusted and impactful digital donation ecosystem.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: To provide a secure, transparent, and efficient digital donation system that ensures fairness and accountability across Qatar.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To create a future where every donation is traceable, impactful, and trusted â€” driving social progress in Qatar and beyond.

values.title: Compliance
values.desc: Strictly aligned with RACA regulations to ensure all donations are legitimate and ethical.

values.title: Transparency
values.desc: Donors, charities, and regulators enjoy complete visibility into donation flows.

values.title: Innovation
values.desc: Integrating Blockchain, AI, and AR/VR to redefine digital giving in Qatar.
